title: Aliens Landed in Bangkok
shortDetail: A mysterious light was seen over the Grand Palace.
fullDetail: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a glowing object descend rapidly. Authorities denied extraterrestrial activity.

title: Bangkok Floods Reach New Record
shortDetail: The Chao Phraya River has overflowed.
fullDetail: Officials confirmed severe flooding in Bangkok suburbs. Thousands evacuated as water levels rise.

title: Elon Musk Buys Thai Island
shortDetail: Rumors spread that Musk acquired a private island in Phuket.
fullDetail: Social media users claimed Elon Musk is planning a rocket base in Thailand. No evidence provided.

title: Thailand Wins World Cup 2026 Bid
shortDetail: FIFA allegedly awarded the 2026 World Cup to Thailand.
fullDetail: The claim circulated widely online, but FIFA confirmed it remains in North America.

comments.text: Would have been amazing if true!

title: New Train Line Opens in Bangkok
shortDetail: The Pink Line officially starts service.
fullDetail: Transport ministry confirmed Bangkokâ€™s Pink Line is now operational, easing commuter traffic.

comments.text: Finally! My commute is easier now.

title: Shark Spotted in Chao Phraya River
shortDetail: Viral video shows a shark fin in Bangkok waters.
fullDetail: Marine experts confirmed the footage was digitally altered. Sharks cannot survive in the river.

title: Thailand Introduces Free Healthcare for All
shortDetail: Government announced expanded healthcare program.
fullDetail: Prime Minister confirmed a universal healthcare package starting next year.

comments.text: This is great news for everyone!

title: Bangkok Skytrain Extends to Pattaya
shortDetail: Social media claims BTS line will reach Pattaya.
fullDetail: Officials denied the viral post. No official project currently exists.

title: First Thai Astronaut to Launch in 2026
shortDetail: Thailand to send astronaut with SpaceX mission.
fullDetail: Confirmed partnership with SpaceX allows Thailand to train and send its first astronaut in 2026.

title: McDonald's Launches Durian Burger
shortDetail: Viral photo shows McDonald's Thailand selling durian burgers.
fullDetail: The company denied the viral menu item. It was a photoshopped advertisement.

title: Thai Baht Hits Record High
shortDetail: Currency strengthens against US dollar.
fullDetail: Economists confirm Thai Baht reached its strongest value in a decade this week.

comments.text: Finally some good news for the economy!
I hope it stays this way.

title: Dinosaurs Found in Chiang Mai
shortDetail: Dig site revealed living dinosaurs underground.
fullDetail: Viral claim suggested dinosaurs were discovered alive. Paleontologists dismissed it as a hoax.

comments.text: This has to be fake ðŸ˜‚

title: Chiang Mai Declared Smart City
shortDetail: Government invests in smart city tech.
fullDetail: Chiang Mai officially recognized as a smart city with IoT and AI systems.

title: Giant Snake Found in Bangkok Mall
shortDetail: Photos show a python in a shopping mall.
fullDetail: Authorities confirmed the snake was real but safely captured by rescue teams.

title: Thailand Discovers Oil Reserves
shortDetail: Rumors claim massive oil fields found in Isan.
fullDetail: Energy ministry denied the reports. No evidence of new oil reserves.

title: Bangkok Air Quality Hits Record Low
shortDetail: Smog levels worsen in central Bangkok.
fullDetail: Pollution control department confirmed hazardous levels of PM2.5.

comments.text: Need to wear masks daily now.

title: Floating City Built in Gulf of Thailand
shortDetail: Viral claim shows futuristic city in the ocean.
fullDetail: Architects confirmed no such project exists. Images were AI-generated.

title: Thai Student Wins Nobel Prize
shortDetail: Bangkok student awarded Nobel for physics.
fullDetail: Confirmed: A Thai student achieved groundbreaking work and was recognized internationally.

title: Time Traveler Arrested in Chiang Rai
shortDetail: Police allegedly caught a man from the future.
fullDetail: Hoax video claimed a man had futuristic devices. Authorities confirmed it was staged.

title: Thailand Opens First AI University
shortDetail: New university focused entirely on AI and robotics.
fullDetail: Education ministry launched Thailandâ€™s first AI University in Bangkok.

title: Meteor Shower Visible in Chiang Mai Tonight
shortDetail: Skywatchers report a spectacular meteor shower.
fullDetail: Astronomers confirm peak visibility of meteor shower tonight across northern Thailand.

title: Bangkok Subway to Introduce Night Service
shortDetail: MRT to operate until midnight starting next month.
fullDetail: Transport authority announced extended subway hours to reduce traffic congestion.

title: Giant Meteor Lands in Phuket
shortDetail: Viral post claims huge meteor crashed into beach.
fullDetail: No official reports confirmed the meteor. Scientists dismiss the post as hoax.

title: Thailand to Host International eSports Tournament
shortDetail: Bangkok selected as venue for global gaming event.
fullDetail: Confirmed by the Ministry of Sports, tournament to attract gamers worldwide next year.

title: Bangkok Zoo Introduces Robot Animals
shortDetail: New robotic wildlife exhibit unveiled.
fullDetail: Zoo claims interactive robot animals for educational purposes. Visitors impressed.

title: Bangkok Launches Electric Bus Fleet
shortDetail: City introduces 100 new electric buses.
fullDetail: The Department of Transport confirmed the deployment of electric buses to reduce pollution.

title: Mystery Crop Circles Appear in Chiang Rai
shortDetail: Unexplained patterns found overnight in fields.
fullDetail: Farmers discovered large crop circles. Experts suggest human-made hoax.

title: Bangkok Introduces Free Wi-Fi in Parks
shortDetail: Government provides free internet access in public areas.
fullDetail: City council confirmed that major parks will have high-speed Wi-Fi available starting next month.

title: Phuket Hosts International Kite Festival
shortDetail: Colorful kites take to the sky.
fullDetail: Tourism board confirms festival attracts global participants every August.

title: Giant Robot Spotted in Bangkok Streets
shortDetail: Viral video shows massive robot wandering city.
fullDetail: The footage was digitally created. Authorities confirm no robot exists.

title: Thailand Launches National Cycling Day
shortDetail: Encouraging citizens to use bicycles.
fullDetail: Government promotes healthier lifestyle and reduced pollution with cycling events nationwide.

title: Phantom Submarine Sighted in Gulf of Thailand
shortDetail: Boaters report a strange underwater vessel.
fullDetail: Naval authorities confirmed it was a misidentified fishing vessel. Hoax news spread online.

title: Bangkok Hosts International Food Festival
shortDetail: Chefs from around the world showcase their cuisine.
fullDetail: Confirmed by tourism authority, festival brings new culinary experiences to locals and tourists.

comments.text: Canâ€™t wait to try the food!

title: Loch Ness Monster Found in Thai Lake
shortDetail: Viral post claims legendary creature spotted.
fullDetail: Experts dismissed claims as fabricated photos. No evidence of creature exists.

title: Thailand Introduces Smart Traffic Lights
shortDetail: AI-driven traffic management system deployed.
fullDetail: Bangkok city officials implement smart lights to reduce congestion and improve safety.
